title: A Plethora of Domains
excerpt: I am the proud owner of 4 domain names: www.alexseifert.com, www.wideopenart.com, www.eswirdkalt.com and www.undesregnet.com. As such, I have been trying to figure out what to do with the latter 3. I use alexseifert.com as my general internet-base for things such as this blog and my other blogs as well as for my music.
